bio1: Hey!ğŸ‘‹ My name is Hiren Mistry and I am a Computer Science Graduate from the University of Warwick.
bio2: I enjoy solving real life and commercial problems, finding fast and efficient solutions to complex challenges. I have experience in designing and developing programs in an array of languages, including Java, Python and HTML. Previous personal and university projects include web design, APIs, object-orientated programming and mobile applications.
bio3: Studying at the University of Warwick has strengthened my problem-solving skills and core understanding in order to produce high-quality algorithms and programs. Learning the fundamental principles of program design and information structures has ensured programs are fully optimized, with a fast user-experience.
bio4: I regularly keep up to date with the latest developments in Science and Technology and am passionate as to what the future of this developing field will bring to the world.
bio5: Aside from software development, I regularly play Badminton and Basketball both competitively and socially.
